permissions: User must be an admin to create tags.
side_effects: Creates a tag and associates it to a tag category.
validation_notes: Flags --name and --tag-category are required. Tag name must be present and is unique per tag category (case-insensitive). Tag category is create-only and cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be present; uniqueness enforced within tag category (case-insensitive).
